Detailed Description

Defines an interface for accessing event data.

Note:
A backing EventImpl object provides the actual data collections via ROOT data structures (trees and branches).

virtual void ldmx::Event::addToCollection ( const std::string &  name,
const TObject &  obj 
) [pure virtual]

Add the given object to the named TClonesArray collection Objects can only be added to a TClonesArray during the current pass -- TClonesArrays loaded from the input data file are not allowed to be changed.

Note:
Object types must implement TObject::Copy().
Parameters:
name Name of the collection.
obj Object to be appended to the collection.

Implemented in ldmx::EventImpl.

bool ldmx::Event::exists ( const std::string &  name,
const std::string &  passName 
) [inline]

Check for the existence of an object or collection with the given name and pass name in the event.

Parameters:
name Name (label, not class name) given to the object when it was put into the event.
passName The process pass label which was in use when this object was put into the event, such as "sim" or "rerecov2".
Returns:
True if the object or collection exists in the event.

const ObjectType ldmx::Event::get ( const std::string &  name,
const std::string &  passName 
) const [inline]

Get a named object with a specific type, specifying the pass name. If there is no object which matches, an exception will be thrown.

Parameters:
name Name (label, not classname) given to the object when it was put into the event.
passName The process pass label which was in use when this object was put into the event, such as "sim" or "rerecov2".
Returns:
A named object from the event.

template<typename ObjectType >
const ObjectType ldmx::Event::get ( const std::string &  name  )  const [inline]

Get a named object with a specific type without specifying the pass name. If there is one-and-only-one object with the given name (excluding the pass) in the event, it will be returned, otherwise an exception will be thrown.

Parameters:
name Name (label, not classname) given to the object when it was put into the event.
Returns:
A named object from the event.

const TClonesArray* ldmx::Event::getCollection ( const std::string &  collectionName,
std::string  passName 
) [inline]

Get an object collection (TClonesArray) from the event, specifying the pass name. If there is no object which matches, an exception will be thrown.

Parameters:
collectionName Name given to the collection when it was put into the event.
passName The process pass label which was in use when this object was put into the event, such as "sim" or "rerecov2".
Returns:
A named TClonesArray from the event.

const TClonesArray* ldmx::Event::getCollection ( const std::string &  collectionName  )  const [inline]

Get a collection (TClonesArray) from the event without specifying the pass name. If there is one-and-only-one object with the given name (excluding the pass) in the event, it will be returned, otherwise an exception will be thrown.

Parameters:
name Name (label, not class name) given to the object when it was put into the event.
Returns:
The named TClonesArray from the event.

virtual const TObject* ldmx::Event::getReal ( const std::string &  itemName,
const std::string &  passName,
bool  mustExist 
) const [protected, pure virtual]

Actual get implementation, provided by derived class.

Parameters:
